caption.p: ( a–d) The SST forcing (shading; units: °C) and 850-hPa winds (vectors; units: m s −1) response, and ( e–h) outgoing longwave radiation response response (shading; W m −2) and 250-hPa eddy velocity potential response (contours; interval is 1.0 × 10 6 m 2 s −2) for ( a,e) weak, ( b,f) moderate, ( c,g) strong, and ( d,h) very strong IPWP Niño forcing.
